text:
day 4/42 of @_nightsweekends s5

- goal: build a software studio that helps startups build awesome apps

- continuing work on the https://t.co/X1FTYjVR7f project! aiming to finish their mvp's ui this week and add functionality starting monday

- went through a website audit for our studio https://t.co/9yARPNU73N (some feedbacks attached below)

- currently doing user testing to see how we can improve our ux and conversion rates

- here's an interesting clip from one of our testers at @userbrain: https://t.co/PETymJwAGa

- currently thinking about how we can maintain the visually appealing nature of our website and also focus on cro and seo

p.s. shout out to https://t.co/56o3lPZHp1 for their awesome audit and recommendations! y'all should check them out.

cc @_buildspace

user_info.name: Parsa T
user_info.description: helping sf startups build apps that users love | infra engineering @Affirm & growing @ https://t.co/seNdHQQsjI | sometimes @fdotinc | @_buildspace s5
